passage.text: Ahhh hello to you and welcome to the Papyrus 3D Demo. Come and find me in the next room. Open that door in front of you by staring at it
Papyrus 3D is an open source game engine built with A-Frame for VR and AR for building interactive games and enviroments. This is a demo and this enviroment is currently under development.
Soon Papyrus 3D will feature a combat system and a more sophistacted interaction system for dialogue
Keep an eye on this demo for further developments. Hopefully soon Papyrus 3D will be ready for its beta release.
For now enjoy exploring this space and testing out the exsisting functionality. Type /tools/MapEditor to try out the map editor too and creating new maps
Damn what a classic computer this is....
